001package io.github.ai4ci.abm;
002
003import java.util.Optional;
004import java.util.stream.Stream;
005
006import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Abstraction.Entity;
007import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Abstraction.TemporalState;
008import io.github.ai4ci.config.execution.ExecutionConfiguration;
009import io.github.ai4ci.config.setup.SetupConfiguration;
010
011/**
012 * Convenience navigation helpers for extracting model-level information from
013 * temporal state objects and related entities.
014 *
015 * <p>
016 * Main purpose: provide a compact collection of static accessors that make it
017 * easy to obtain frequently used model objects (for example the current
018 * {@link OutbreakState}, {@link OutbreakBaseline}, execution and setup
019 * configurations) from a variety of temporal and entity wrappers.
020 *
021 * <p>
022 * Downstream uses: used widely across builders, initialisers and update logic
023 * to avoid repetitive dereferencing (for example in state updaters, analysis
024 * code and calibration routines). Typical consumers include
025 * {@link io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.Updater}, initialisers and diagnostic
026 * helpers.
027 *
028 * @author Rob Challen
029 */
030public class ModelNav {
031
032        /**
033         * Convenience accessor for a person's baseline demographic data.
034         *
035         * @param person the person entity
036         * @return the {@link PersonBaseline} for the person
037         */
038        public static PersonBaseline baseline(Person person) {
039                return person.getBaseline();
040        }
041
042        /**
043         * Convenience accessor for a person's baseline demographic data.
044         *
045         * @param person the temporal person state wrapper
046         * @return the {@link PersonBaseline} for the person
047         */
048        public static PersonBaseline baseline(PersonTemporalState person) {
049                return person.getEntity().getBaseline();
050        }
051
052        /**
053         * Return the current {@link PersonState} for the supplied history entry.
054         *
055         * @param person a {@link PersonHistory} entry
056         * @return the corresponding current {@link PersonState}
057         */
058        public static PersonState current(PersonHistory person) {
059                return person.getEntity().getCurrentState();
060        }
061
062        /**
063         * Return the optional current {@link OutbreakHistory} for the supplied
064         * outbreak state.
065         *
066         * @param outbreakState the outbreak state wrapper
067         * @return an optional current {@link OutbreakHistory}
068         */
069        public static Optional<OutbreakHistory> history(
070                        OutbreakState outbreakState
071        ) {
072                return outbreakState.getEntity().getCurrentHistory();
073        }
074
075        /**
076         * Stream past outbreak history entries limited to the supplied period.
077         *
078         * @param outbreakState the outbreak state wrapper
079         * @param period        number of historical entries to return (most recent
080         *                      first)
081         * @return a stream of {@link OutbreakHistory} limited to {@code period}
082         */
083        public static Stream<OutbreakHistory> history(
084                        OutbreakState outbreakState, int period
085        ) {
086                return outbreakState.getEntity().getHistory().stream().limit(period);
087        }
088
089        /**
090         * Return the current history entry for the supplied temporal person state.
091         *
092         * @param person a {@link PersonState} wrapper
093         * @return an optional current {@link PersonHistory} if present
094         */
095        public static Optional<PersonHistory> history(PersonState person) {
096                return person.getEntity().getCurrentHistory();
097        }
098
099        /**
100         * Stream historical person entries up to the supplied number of days.
101         *
102         * @param person a {@link PersonState} wrapper
103         * @param days   number of history days to return (most recent first)
104         * @return a stream of {@link PersonHistory} entries limited to {@code days}
105         */
106        public static Stream<PersonHistory> history(PersonState person, int days) {
107                return person.getEntity().getHistory().stream().limit(days);
108        }
109
110        /**
111         * Return the outbreak baseline from an outbreak temporal state.
112         *
113         * @param outbreakState the outbreak temporal state wrapper
114         * @return the {@link OutbreakBaseline} for the outbreak
115         */
116        public static OutbreakBaseline modelBase(
117                        OutbreakTemporalState outbreakState
118        ) {
119                return outbreakState.getEntity().getBaseline();
120        }
121
122        /**
123         * Return the outbreak baseline for a plain {@link Person}.
124         *
125         * @param person the person entity
126         * @return the {@link OutbreakBaseline} used for the person's outbreak
127         */
128        public static OutbreakBaseline modelBase(Person person) {
129                return person.getOutbreak().getBaseline();
130        }
131
132        /**
133         * Return the outbreak baseline for the outbreak containing the supplied
134         * person temporal state.
135         *
136         * @param person the temporal person state wrapper
137         * @return the {@link OutbreakBaseline} used for the person's outbreak
138         */
139        public static OutbreakBaseline modelBase(PersonTemporalState person) {
140                return person.getEntity().getOutbreak().getBaseline();
141        }
142
143        /**
144         * Retrieve the execution configuration from an entity (person or outbreak).
145         *
146         * @param entity an {@link Entity} instance
147         * @return the corresponding {@link ExecutionConfiguration}
148         * @throws RuntimeException if the entity type is not supported
149         */
150        public static ExecutionConfiguration modelParam(Entity entity) {
151                if (entity instanceof Outbreak)
152                        return ((Outbreak) entity).getExecutionConfiguration();
153                if (entity instanceof Person)
154                        return ((Person) entity).getOutbreak().getExecutionConfiguration();
155                throw new RuntimeException();
156        }
157
158        /**
159         * Return execution configuration parameters from an outbreak temporal state.
160         *
161         * @param outbreak the temporal outbreak state wrapper
162         * @return the {@link ExecutionConfiguration} for the outbreak
163         */
164        public static ExecutionConfiguration modelParam(
165                        OutbreakTemporalState outbreak
166        ) {
167                return outbreak.getEntity().getExecutionConfiguration();
168        }
169
170        /**
171         * Return execution configuration parameters for a plain {@link Person}.
172         *
173         * @param person the person entity
174         * @return the {@link ExecutionConfiguration} for the person's outbreak
175         */
176        public static ExecutionConfiguration modelParam(Person person) {
177                return person.getOutbreak().getExecutionConfiguration();
178        }
179
180        /**
181         * Return execution configuration parameters for the outbreak that contains
182         * the supplied person temporal state.
183         *
184         * @param person the temporal person state wrapper
185         * @return the {@link ExecutionConfiguration} for the person's outbreak
186         */
187        public static ExecutionConfiguration modelParam(PersonTemporalState person) {
188                return person.getEntity().getOutbreak().getExecutionConfiguration();
189        }
190
191        /**
192         * Retrieve execution parameters from a generic temporal state instance.
193         *
194         * @param temporalState a temporal state (person or outbreak)
195         * @return the corresponding {@link ExecutionConfiguration}
196         * @throws RuntimeException if the temporal state type is not recognised
197         */
198        public static ExecutionConfiguration modelParam(
199                        TemporalState<?> temporalState
200        ) {
201                if (temporalState instanceof OutbreakTemporalState)
202                        return modelParam((OutbreakTemporalState) temporalState);
203                if (temporalState instanceof PersonTemporalState)
204                        return modelParam((PersonTemporalState) temporalState);
205                throw new RuntimeException("Unknown temporal state type");
206        }
207
208        /**
209         * Retrieve the setup configuration from an entity (person or outbreak).
210         *
211         * @param entity an {@link Entity} instance
212         * @return the corresponding {@link SetupConfiguration}
213         * @throws RuntimeException if the entity type is not supported
214         */
215        public static SetupConfiguration modelSetup(Entity entity) {
216                if (entity instanceof Outbreak)
217                        return ((Outbreak) entity).getSetupConfiguration();
218                if (entity instanceof Person)
219                        return ((Person) entity).getOutbreak().getSetupConfiguration();
220                throw new RuntimeException();
221        }
222
223        /**
224         * Retrieve setup configuration for an outbreak temporal state.
225         *
226         * @param outbreak the outbreak temporal state wrapper
227         * @return the {@link SetupConfiguration} for the outbreak
228         */
229        public static SetupConfiguration modelSetup(OutbreakTemporalState outbreak) {
230                return outbreak.getEntity().getSetupConfiguration();
231        }
232
233        /**
234         * Retrieve setup configuration for a person temporal state by delegating to
235         * the person's outbreak.
236         *
237         * @param outbreak the person temporal state wrapper
238         * @return the {@link SetupConfiguration} for the person's outbreak
239         */
240        public static SetupConfiguration modelSetup(PersonTemporalState outbreak) {
241                return outbreak.getEntity().getOutbreak().getSetupConfiguration();
242        }
243
244        /**
245         * Retrieve setup configuration from a generic temporal state instance.
246         *
247         * @param temporalState a temporal state (person or outbreak)
248         * @return the corresponding {@link SetupConfiguration}
249         * @throws RuntimeException if the temporal state type is not recognised
250         */
251        public static SetupConfiguration modelSetup(TemporalState<?> temporalState) {
252                if (temporalState instanceof OutbreakTemporalState)
253                        return modelSetup((OutbreakTemporalState) temporalState);
254                if (temporalState instanceof PersonTemporalState)
255                        return modelSetup((PersonTemporalState) temporalState);
256                throw new RuntimeException("Unknown temporal state type");
257        }
258
259        /**
260         * Return the current outbreak state for a plain {@link Person}.
261         *
262         * @param person the person entity
263         * @return the current {@link OutbreakState} for the person's outbreak
264         */
265        public static OutbreakState modelState(Person person) {
266                return person.getOutbreak().getCurrentState();
267        }
268
269        /**
270         * Return the current outbreak state for the supplied person temporal state.
271         *
272         * @param person the temporal person state wrapper
273         * @return the current {@link OutbreakState} for the person's outbreak
274         */
275        public static OutbreakState modelState(PersonTemporalState person) {
276                return person.getEntity().getOutbreak().getCurrentState();
277        }
278
279        /**
280         * Find the outbreak history entry that corresponds to the supplied person
281         * history time point.
282         *
283         * @param personHistory a {@link PersonHistory} entry
284         * @return the matching {@link OutbreakHistory}
285         */
286        public static OutbreakHistory outbreakHistory(PersonHistory personHistory) {
287                int time = personHistory.getTime();
288                return personHistory.getEntity().getOutbreak().getHistoryEntry(time)
289                                .get();
290        }
291
292        /**
293         * Get the current outbreak state for the supplied person temporal history.
294         *
295         * @param hist a {@link PersonTemporalState}
296         * @return the corresponding current {@link OutbreakState}
297         */
298        public static OutbreakState outbreakState(PersonTemporalState hist) {
299                return hist.getEntity().getOutbreak().getCurrentState();
300        }
301
302        /**
303         * Stream the person entities for the supplied outbreak state.
304         *
305         * @param current the current {@link OutbreakState}
306         * @return a parallel stream of {@link Person} entities
307         */
308        public static Stream<Person> people(OutbreakState current) {
309                return current.getEntity().getPeople().parallelStream();
310        }
311
312        /**
313         * Stream the current history entry for every person in the supplied outbreak
314         * state.
315         *
316         * @param current the current {@link OutbreakState}
317         * @return a parallel stream of current {@link PersonHistory} entries
318         */
319        public static Stream<PersonHistory> peopleCurrentHistory(
320                        OutbreakState current
321        ) {
322                return current.getEntity().getPeople().parallelStream()
323                                .flatMap(p -> p.getCurrentHistory().stream());
324        }
325
326        /**
327         * The corresponding history entries for this point in time in the outbreak
328         * i.e. a stream of individuals' history entries at the same time point.
329         *
330         * @param outbreakHistory the outbreak history entry to reference
331         * @return a stream of {@link PersonHistory} entries for the same time
332         */
333        public static Stream<PersonHistory> peopleHistory(
334                        OutbreakHistory outbreakHistory
335        ) {
336                int time = outbreakHistory.getTime();
337                return outbreakHistory.getEntity().getPeople().stream()
338                                .flatMap(p -> p.getHistoryEntry(time).stream());
339        }
340
341        /**
342         * Stream the current state of every person in the supplied outbreak state.
343         *
344         * @param current the current {@link OutbreakState}
345         * @return a parallel stream of {@link PersonState} for each person
346         */
347        public static Stream<PersonState> peopleState(OutbreakState current) {
348                return current.getEntity().getPeople().parallelStream()
349                                .map(p -> p.getCurrentState());
350        }
351
352}
